se.softhouse.common.guavaextensions
Class Functions2

java.lang.Object
  se.softhouse.common.guavaextensions.Functions2

public final class Functions2
extends Object

Gives you static access to additional implementations of the Function interface, as a complement to Functions

Method Detail

compound

@Nonnull
public static <T> Function<T,T> compound(Function<T,T> first,
                                                 Function<T,T> second)
Runs several Functions in the same order as they are given as arguments here.
If one of the Functions makes T Immutable, make sure to pass it in last as it's hard to modify an Immutable value. This works exactly like Functions.compose(Function, Function) except that if first doesn't do anything, second is returned directly instead.

Parameters:
first - a Function
second - another Function
Returns:
a merged Function

listTransformer

@Nonnull
public static <E> Function<List<E>,List<E>> listTransformer(Function<E,E> elementTransformer)
Creates a Function that applies elementTransformer to each element of the input List and puts the new elements in a new , immutable, list and returns it.

mapValueTransformer

@Nonnull
public static <K,V> Function<Map<K,V>,Map<K,V>> mapValueTransformer(Function<V,V> valueTransformer)
Creates a Function that applies valueTransformer to each value of the input Map and puts them in a new , immutable, map and returns it.

unmodifiableList

@Nonnull
public static <E> Function<List<E>,List<E>> unmodifiableList()
Creates a Function that wraps Lists with Collections.unmodifiableList(List)

unmodifiableMap

@Nonnull
public static <K,V> Function<Map<K,V>,Map<K,V>> unmodifiableMap()
Creates a Function that wraps Maps with Collections.unmodifiableMap(Map)

repeat

@Nonnull
public static <T> Function<T,T> repeat(Function<T,T> function,
                                               long times)
Runs function times times. The result of the first call is passed to the next apply in the chain and so on. For instance: 
 
 assertThat(Functions2.repeat(ADD_ONE, 2).apply(0)).isEqualTo(2);

fileToString

public static Function<File,String> fileToString()
Returns a Function that reads whole Files into Strings using the UTF-8 charset.
